docs.title: VoiceScriptPlayer Docs
docs.text:
Welcome to the official documentation for VoiceScriptPlayer 🎵

  • Getting Started
  • Features
  • Interactive Events
  • AI
  • FAQ

docs.title: AI Features
docs.text:
• Automatic subtitle generation (Patreon supporters only)
  • Future AI-based audio analysis
  • Helps reduce repetitive work

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text:
Q. How do I share projects? A. For now, share project files directly. A dedicated platform is planned.

Q. What are Interactive Events? A. Events triggered by user input (key press, button click) combined with the media timeline.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Cut Editing & Looping
  • Insert Sound Effects
  • Adjust Volume
  • Subtitles Timeline
  • (Planned) Speed Control

docs.title: First Run
docs.text:
1. Launch VoiceScriptPlayer
  2. Create a new project
  3. Import sample media

docs.title: Interactive Events
docs.text:
You can add interactive triggers:

  • Key press (e.g. Space, Enter)
  • UI button click
  • Timeline-based triggers

Example: At 1:25 → Show subtitle + Play sound effect
